revisionDesc.change: moved unclear encoding around 'wanted' to include only 'ed'
moved notes to external notes file and added pts
Proofreading Corrections: Heyde dates and Silent Proof
Added date annotation and proofreading corrections, updated notes
corrected date format in title; added call no., annotations

body.p:
i have nothing to write this week i have got all out of news) but i cant can't feel satisfied till i write something so much for habit it seems when i get A letter as if i must answer it i have been writing a few lines to george i dont don't know whether i have written to you that he went out to camden Camden to take a contract and stan the foundry man wouldent wouldn't sign it so he had to come back and have some alteration made in the length of pipes he came back friday Friday and went back to camden Camden last monday Monday morning he said when he come back to brooklyn Brooklyn again he should come for good mr Lane is to send an inspector out for george to instruct mr Lane keeps him along so he will be on hand when they
commence here) George wanted me to write about some rooms that was in the eagle saturday Saturday night in carlton aveCarlton Ave. i went monday Monday to see about them but they were taken) mrs brown was here yesterday they are looking for apartments too mrs black was here yesterday she sends her love to you she has written to the pension bureau and got an answer that there is no such name on record so she is satisfied) i got your package yesterday Walter with the envelopes and letter and 1 dollar and book to read that seemes seems as if half the people passed counterfiet counterfeit and when i opened it i thought there is no letter but i found one) i got a letter from Jeff to day i thought when i read it he must have written it running for i could hardly make it out he is very busy he says they have moovd moved and are all better than they were at the hotel) i have had another from Charley heyde what i wrote about hans Han's coming has stirred him up this letter is much better than the others he wishes you and george to write to han and sent his respets respects to george

postscript.p: i am as well as usual
